column2: German stocks - Factors to watch on August 5 FRANKFURT
column3: Aug 5 The following are some of the factors that may move German stocks on Friday:

column2: Alibaba says it is not making an investment in Netflix SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Aug 5 Alibaba Group Holding Inc  is not making an investment in Netflix Inc
column4: Alibaba spokesman Bob Christie told Reuters on Friday.
